[TYPES]

Mobility Option TLV data structure: Link-local Address Option (RFC5213). More...

#include <pmip_types.h>

Data Fields

__u8 ip6link_type
 Option type, value is 26.
__u8 ip6link_len
 8-bit unsigned integer indicating the length of the option in octets, excluding the type and length fields. This field MUST be set to 16.
struct in6_addr ip6link_addr
 A sixteen-byte field containing the link-local address.
